courses.Course description: Seminar, one hour. Discussion of and critical thinking about topics of current intellectual importance, taught by faculty members in their areas of expertise and illuminating many paths of discovery at UCLA. P/NP grading.

courses.course number & title: 291A. Variable Topics in East Asian Studies
courses.Course description: Seminar, three hours. Selected topics on East Asia. May be repeated for credit with topic change. S/U or letter grading.

courses.course number & title: 291B. Variable Topics in East Asian Studies
courses.Course description: Seminar, three hours. Selected topics on East Asia. May be repeated for credit with topic change. S/U or letter grading.
